description: Scaling dynamics in local-neighborhood transformers: wall of flesh.
onLoad:
new Array(10000).fill().forEach((_,i) => level.actors['target'+(i+100)] = {like:'target1', pos:[Math.random(), Math.random()], onLost() {level.score += 100/10000}}); 
 (async function() { const at=null;  await api.window([`…Anyway, I'll let you deal with this one, mighty spirit.`], at, 8); })()
onWon:
(async function() { const at=null;  api.levelSuggest('levels/x1/4.json');  await api.window(`Oh! You're done!`, at, 4);  await api.window(`Fairies beat demons.`, at, 4);  await api.window(`I'll admit: that bunch was the most terrifying thing I've ever seen.
I'm only human.
And a gun doesn't help even against one o' these, let alone ten thousand.
I thought hope is lost.`, at, 8);  await api.window(`But you… brought it back.`, at, 4);  api.levelLoad('levels/x1/4.json') })()
